In England, in the seven days to 26 May, there were 15,296 new confirmed cases (27.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 May, there were 12,413 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 23% (2,883 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 31 May is 3,916,049 (6,957.3 cases per 100,000 population).
